function.name: getWeather
function.description: Retrieves the current weather conditions for a specific city. Use this function only when the user requests weather information.

cityName.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the weather.

function.name: getCostOfLiving
function.description: Fetches the cost of living for a specific city, including expenses such as housing, food, transportation, and other living costs.

cityName.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve cost of living information.

function.name: getRandomCity
function.description: Generates a random city from anywhere in the world. Useful for exploring new places or providing a random suggestion.
